page.title: 19Concerns & Worries
page.content: From interviews the following concerns & worries emerged but it is difficult to say how representative they are. Effect of the development of Stansted Airport; the standard of secondary education in Stevenage; environmental questions; the condition of the roads; need for more recreational facilities; better bus service; better parking facilities; a village policeman. Some felt the development of Stanstead, could change the whole character of our community with pressure for new roads & accommodation. This is linked with concern about increasing urban encroachment from Stevenage. There is concern about the policy of the district council in making Walkern 'a dumping ground for surplus council tenants'. A deeper fear is of unemployment already happening as a backlash from Stevenage.
